__e: As water is wet, as jade is hard, as bread is life, so God is love.
Don't you tell me what I can do and can't do. Jade is my daughter.
I saw how Jade is, but try to get her talking about Jenny if you can, OK?
Listen, Jade, I don't know what to say.
Finally, he asked for the jade.
Jade, I'm not an evil man.
There is no righteousness in politics and no honor in war.
I think that night, that night that I came down and saw you with Jade, and then made love to my husband... I was making love to you.
Look, I mean, I guess Jade and I aren't really "friends" friends...
